About

Welcome to Apéritif!

Apéritif: The Online Cookbook allows you to search, add and edit recipes.

Search our recipes to find something to eat that's just right. Choose from a range of cuisines and meal types that accommodate your dietary needs should you require meals that are vegetarian, dairy-free, nut-free, gluten-free or low in sugar. As a registered user, you may add your favourites to view instantly from your account.

As a registered user, share your own recipes with the rest of the community by adding recipes from the link in your account page or directly from the menu located in the navigation bar at the top of the page.

Check out the Discover page for an overview of Apéritif's data. The Discover page displays what recipes are the most viewed and the most favourited along with recent additions to the database. In addition, the page provides a visual representation of the proportion of each recipe in the database based on cuisines that have been viewed, submitted and favourited to track trends among users.

The Products page provides an array of kitchen utensils to help you make your meal just the way you want it. Head over there now and treat yourself to a better cooking experience. And finally...

Enjoy your meal!
